name: Byung-Jun Lee 0001
content: DMLab DMLab ☰ × Home People Professor Members Publication Papers Decision Making laboratory @ Korea University Department of Artificial Intelligence Welcome to the DM-lab website. We understand and develop reliable and robust intelligent algorithms for data-driven decision makings. Recently, our work has predominantly focused on reinforcement learning (RL) and industrial AI. We always look for graduate students (or postdoc researchers) with a strong interest in AI/ML. If you are interested, send an email to Byung-Jun Lee (byungjunlee@korea.ac.kr) with your CV. If you are interested in our published research, visit our YouTube channel to explore summaries and insights from our latest papers. Recent News [2025/11] One paper was accepted to AAAI! [2025/09] Two papers were accepted to NeurIPS! [2025/08] Two papers were accepted to EMNLP! [2025/05] Our paper was accepted to ACL! [2025/05] Our paper was accepted to ICML! [2025/02] Our paper was accepted to CVPR! Last edited on August 9th 2021 08:18PM (Time Zone: KST). Powered by jemdoc + new design.
